show_name: Buddy Complex: Into the Skies of Tomorrow (special)
other_title: Buddy Complex Kanketsu-hen -Ano Sora ni Kaeru Mirai de- (Japanese)
バディ・コンプレックス 完結編 ―あの空に還る未来で― (Japanese)
plot: The 2 episodes form a continuation of the series "Buddy Complex". It explains the history behind Hina, Aoba and Bizon as well as the time travels while the war between the Free pact Alliance and the Zogilia Republic continues.This a continuation of original Buddy Complex (TV) animation series (link has to be set up).
ending_theme: "Ano Sora ni Kaeru Mirai de" (あの空に還る未来で; In the Future When We Return to Those Skies) by ChouCho
